TopicTitle: KSP - How to disable Stock Agencies

Articles.Content: So, I wanna disable Stock Agencies in my new career playthrough of KSP. How would I go about doing that?

Been working on a contract pack, perhaps this patch (made by mahlax) archive can help you. It doesn't disable the agencies but the stock contracts. This is the file 

Edited February 15 by Gupyzer0

Not sure it's a good idea. Some contracts may be hardcoded to specific agents.

However, aggressive ModuleManager patch to do this - may also delete any mod agencies that use Squad flags: 

// delete any agent using a flag from GameData/Squad/Agencies/
!AGENT:HAS[#logoURL[Squad?Agencies*]] {}

Result from MMPatch.log on a mostly stock test build.

Spoiler

[LOG 17:32:04.012] Applying delete ZZZ_Custom/Delete_agents/!AGENT:HAS[#logoURL[Squad?Agencies*]] to Squad/Agencies/Agents.cfg/AGENT[C7 Aerospace Division]
